feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -26.6°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -32.6°C
Wind: N 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
